Message:
I slowly crawled towards her
on the ice-cold floor,
but she still didn’t turn around.

She only had eyes
for Her Holiness.

Florence gazed at her
with the same adoration
she had always given me...

The moment I saw that,
something inside me broke.
It’s not the world I know...

Florence would never do
such a horrible thing...

He has guided all
that has come to be...

He speaks to me,
demanding that I purify
this twisted world.

If He wills it,
I must obey.

I shall tear asunder
all that is impure...
